programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o STKBrass.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
ifrq = p4 kv1 line p5, p3, p6 ;lip tension kv3 line p7, p3, p8 ;speed of low-frequency oscillator
asig STKBrass cpspch(ifrq), 1, 2, kv1, 4, 100, 11, kv3, 1, 10, 128, 40 asig = asig *3 ;amplify outs asig, asig endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 8.05 100 120 50 0 i 1 + 3 9.00 80 82 10 0 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
